name: Epic Racing (WilsonGames88)
description:
Elephant Controls-
Press W To Move Forward
Press A To Move Left
Press D To Move Right
Lion Controls-
Press The Up Arrow To Move Forward 
Press Left Arrow To Move Left
Press Right Arrow To Move Right
Press The Button To Switch Map
Press 1 For Changing Costume On Player 1
Press 2 For Changing Costume On Player 2
